dcterms:creator: Oscar Koller
Jens Forster
Hermann Ney
dcterms:description: The PHOENIX14 dataset is a widely used continuous sign language recognition dataset recorded from the German TV weather forecasts, performed by nine hearing sign language interpreters. It contains 6841 sentences with 1295 different glosses, split into training, development, and test sets.
dcterms:title: PHOENIX14

dcterms:creator: Jie Huang
Wengang Zhou
Qilin Zhang
Houqiang Li
Weiping Li
dcterms:description: The CSL dataset is collected under laboratory conditions with 100 sign language sentences and a vocabulary size of 178. Fifty signers perform each sentence five times, resulting in 25000 videos with over 100 hours of content.
dcterms:title: CSL
